item.title: IT Conference in Paris: New Horizons of Technology
item.description:
The Tech & Innovation Summit Paris 2025 conference took place at the modern Station F technology hub, gathering over 5,000 participants from around the world. The program was packed with events, from morning keynote speeches to evening networking sessions and hands-on workshops.

Highlights included:

  • A presentation by a Google expert on AI ethics and algorithm transparency.
  • A panel discussion on cybersecurity in the age of quantum computing.
  • Workshops on creating sustainable software solutions using Python and Go.

I also visited several startup booths showcasing innovations in healthcare, smart city infrastructure, and education. The conference atmosphere was inspiring and reminded me how rapidly technology evolves.

This event not only enriched my knowledge but also marked an important milestone in my professional journey as an aspiring developer.
